sources.title: Billion Dollar Limited (1942)
sources.description: Robbers target a special train carrying a billion dollars worth of gold, and the only one who can stop them is Superman! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/billion-dollar-limited-1942/

metadata.Plot: An enormous gold shipment en route to the mint is hijacked by well armed robbers, and Lois Lane is trapped in the runaway locomotive. This looks like a job for Superman...
metadata.Writer: Joe Shuster, Jerry Siegel, Seymour Kneitel
metadata.Actors: Bud Collyer, Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck
